languages.text: "Мы — деловое предприятия, а не кровное братство. В ситуации, когда на наши активы ведет наступление один Вольный Торговец, мы предпочтем заручиться дружбой другой династии, а не враждовать с ней. И смерть Владайма не меняет этого никоим образом".

"We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."
languages.original_text: "Мы — деловое предприятия, а не кровное братство. В ситуации, когда на наши активы ведет наступление один Вольный Торговец, мы предпочтем заручиться дружбой другой династии, а не враждовать с ней. И смерть Владайма не меняет этого никоим образом".

traits.locale_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather obtain the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

"We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather obtain the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

"We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

languages.text: 「私たちはビジネス事業であって、慈善団体ではないわ。ひとりの自由開拓者に資産を侵害しされているような状況なら、他の家と争うよりも助力を求める。ヴラダイムが死んでも何も変わりはないわ」
languages.original_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはビジネス事業であって、慈善団体ではないわ。ひとりの自由開拓者に資産を侵害しされているような状況なら、他の家と争うよりも助力を求める。ヴラダイムが死んでも何も変わりはないわ」

languages.text: « Nous sommes une entreprise commerciale, pas une fraternité de sang. Si un libre-marchand vient empiéter sur notre territoire, on préfère chercher à obtenir le soutien d'une autre maison, plutôt que d'entrer en conflit direct. La mort de Vladaym ne fait aucune différence. »
languages.original_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes une entreprise commerciale, pas une fraternité de sang. Si un libre-marchand vient empiéter sur notre territoire, on préfère chercher à obtenir le soutien d'une autre maison, plutôt que d'entrer en conflit direct. La mort de Vladaym ne fait aucune différence. »

languages.text: “我们是商业组织，不是什么血仇兄弟会。就算某个行商浪人打算蚕食我们的财产，我们也不会与她正面结仇，而是会努力确保另一位行商浪人的支持。就算弗拉迪姆死了，情况也不会有任何变化。”
languages.original_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

traits.locale_text: “我们是商业组织，不是什么血仇兄弟会。就算某个行商浪人打算蚕食我们的财产，我们也不会与她正面结仇，而是会努力赢得另一位行商浪人的支持。就算弗拉迪姆死了，情况也不会有任何变化。”

languages.text: "Wir sind ein Geschäftsunternehmen, keine Blutsbruderschaft. Wenn eine Freihändlerin unsere Aktivposten bedroht, ziehen wir die Unterstützung eines anderen Hauses einem Konflikt vor. Und Vladayms Tod macht da keinen Unterschied."
languages.original_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind ein Geschäftsunternehmen, keine Blutsbruderschaft. Wenn eine Freihändlerin unsere Aktivposten bedroht, ziehen wir die Unterstützung eines anderen Hauses einem Konflikt vor. Und Vladayms Tod macht da keinen Unterschied."

languages.text: «Somos una empresa comercial, no una hermandad de sangre. Si hay un Comerciante Independiente invadiendo nuestros activos, preferimos asegurarnos el apoyo de otra casa que entrar en conflicto con ella. Y la muerte de Vladaym no cambia nada».
languages.original_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

traits.locale_text: «Somos una empresa comercial, no una hermandad de sangre. Si hay un Comerciante Independiente invadiendo nuestros activos, preferimos obtener el apoyo de otra casa que entrar en conflicto con ella. Y la muerte de Vladaym no cambia nada».

languages.text: "Biz kan kardeşliği değil, ticari bir işletmeyiz. Bir Hür Tacir'in varlıklarımıza el uzatması durumunda, başka bir haneyle kavgaya tutuşmaktansa onlardan destek almaya gayret ederiz. Vladaym'ın ölümü de bu durumu değiştirmiyor."
languages.original_text: "We are a business enterprise, not a blood fraternity. In a situation where one Rogue Trader is encroaching upon our assets, we would rather secure the support of another house than feud with it. And Vladaym's death makes no difference."

traits.locale_text: "Biz bir kan kardeşliği değil, ticari bir işletmeyiz. Bir Hür Tacir'in varlıklarımıza el uzattığı bir durumda, başka bir haneyle kavgaya girişmektense onlardan destek almayı garantilemek isteriz. Vladaym'ın ölümü de bu durumu değiştirmiyor."
